tool_description: Monitors the status of scheduled pickups and provides real-time updates on pickup completion and any issues.

carrier.description: Carrier handling the pickup: ups, fedex, usps, dhl

error_messages: Invalid confirmation number: Pickup confirmation number not found in system.
Invalid carrier: Use one of [ups, fedex, usps, dhl].
Pickup not scheduled: No pickup found for the provided confirmation number.
Status unavailable: Unable to retrieve current pickup status from carrier.
usage: Provide pickup confirmation number and carrier to get current status and any updates on the pickup request.

pickup_status.description: Current status: scheduled, in_progress, completed, cancelled, failed

actual_pickup_time.description: Actual pickup completion time if completed

driver_notes.description: Any notes from the pickup driver

packages_collected.description: Number of packages successfully picked up

next_update_time.description: When next status update is expected
